short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Persado Connect provides automation tools to help deploy Persado experiments to ESPs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Setup your subject line experiments instantly.

Stop writing subject lines and start using Persado’s AI technology to dramatically impact open rates and click-through-rates.

Marketers who have access to Persado Pro can use the Persado Connect chrome extension to set up their subject line tests in less than 30 seconds. It’s not only quick, it’s super easy to use.

What you can do with Persado Pro Email:

 • Achieve double-digit uplift in open rate and click-through-rates with machine-generated subject lines
 • Set-up bigger tests in less time, and
 • Sit back, relax, and watch the machine learn and take the guesswork out of subject line testing.

_________________________________________

Supported ESPs:

 • Bronto
 • IBM - Silverpop
 • UPCOMING - Sailthru

Benefits:

 • Send subject lines from your Persado Pro account to your ESP instantly
 • Set up a multi-variant A/B test for your email campaign in only a few seconds
 • Automatically get results into your Persado Pro account. No data upload necessary.


Interested in learning more about Persado? Contact us at: info@persado.com.

Support & Feedback:
If you need help or would like to give feedback, email us at prosupport@persado.com.

By installing the extension, you agree to Persado’s Terms and Conditions: https://www.persado.com/pro-terms-of-service.
